[DQC.US.0004.9282] Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest with a value of 1,475,588,000 is not equal to the combined total of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI and Noncontrolling Interest ( 1,410,849,000 + 20,309,000 ) with a value of 1,431,158,000.
These values should be equal.
